metadata.author: Samuel Hahnemann
metadata.title: Materia Medica Pura
metadata.description: A curated selection based on Hahnemann's original provings, emphasizing pure, characteristic symptoms.
metadata.philosophy: Symptom-centric, based on pure provings on healthy individuals. The totality of characteristic symptoms is paramount.

keynotes: Ailments from grief, fright, worry, or disappointed love
Contradictory and paradoxical symptoms
Sighing and sobbing
Lump in throat (globus hystericus)
Extremely sensitive to external impressions

mindSymptoms.description: Moody, introspective, and silent grief. Easily offended. Rapid changes of mood from joy to sadness. Desire to be alone.

keynotes: Right-sided complaints, or symptoms go from right to left
Worse from 4 to 8 PM
Intellectually keen but physically weak
Anticipatory anxiety
Abdominal bloating and flatulence, especially lower abdomen

mindSymptoms.description: Lack of self-confidence, but can be dictatorial at home. Apprehensive, afraid to be alone. Hurried when eating. Aversion to undertaking new things.

keynotes: Aversion to being washed
Burning sensations, worse from heat of bed
Stands and walks stooped
Early morning diarrhea, drives him out of bed
Redness of all orifices

mindSymptoms.description: The 'philosophical rag-picker'. Selfish, egotistical, and messy. Thinks old rags are beautiful things. Lazy, avoids work. Irritable and depressed.

keynotes: Great restlessness and anxiety, driving from place to place
Burning pains, relieved by heat
Prostration, out of proportion to the illness
Thirst for small sips of cold water frequently
Symptoms worse after midnight, especially 1-2 AM

mindSymptoms.description: Anxious, fearful, and restless. Fear of death, of being left alone. Great fastidiousness, wants everything in its proper place. Despair of recovery.

keynotes: Indifference to loved ones and occupation
Sensation of a ball in inner parts
Bearing-down sensation, must cross limbs to prevent protrusion
Morning sickness, nausea at smell or sight of food
Yellow saddle across the nose

mindSymptoms.description: Indifferent, even to her family. Weeps when telling her symptoms. Averse to occupation and family. Anxious toward evening.
